attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD :/ by your trusty dusty and musty rat :)
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and IT WAS UNBELIEVABLY TERRIBLE!! As soon as I opened the app a random person messaged me and asked if I had TOE pics. But he only wanted one if I was trump supporter. And I said NO. Then I asked how he found me and he said through This app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD if you want random creepy trump supporters in your dms. ALSO. Dora came to my house and told me to leave with her. So as the queen she is I accepted. WORST IDEA EVER. she forced me to eat boots POOP. And told me to sing the song foreigner while she dances on the pink pole. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!! I AM TRAUMATIZED FOR LIFE!!!

attributes.title: Tryhard
attributes.review: Lemme start it off by saying ive been dowoading this app since i was 4 it just now got done This game is soooo bad bro im on the android 15 and i still get 12 fps this game is full of tryhards i cant even build like them the p90 is to op bruh and when i try flying i always get shot down by a opressor mk2 and this storyline is so bad why did they have to kill joel he was litterally a main character

attributes.title: Bad entertainment

attributes.title: TRUMP STOLE FROM ME
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS DESPICABLE APP!!! As soon as I downloaded it, Kanye West came over and he had a big bag that he was holding. And the bag was moving!! I thought that it was Kim kardashian because the bag looked like it had a really fat tooshie, but no!! Out popped Mr. Trump!! What the heck?!?  I was so excited that our non racist, completely amazzzzinnnggggg, unhomophobic president was at my house, but then he started taking his clothes off and started running around my house!! Kanye West disappeared and he was talking about some girl bleaching her butt hole which I have no idea what that was about but Mr. trump then picked up my dog and then he started flying! Naked trump was flying all over my house with my dog! He then broke my window and he flied over to the raci- I mean White House with my poor doggy mittens:( I will never forgive mr trump for his actions and this app is the reason my dog got stolenğŸ’”ğŸ’”ğŸ’”

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!!
attributes.review:
I decided to download this app to support my fellow president. It took a whole week to download!!! After downloading my phone started to glitched and become hacked. Every picture app or anything I had in my phone was ERASED. I was confused so I went to my local Apple store and they couldnâ€™t do anything about it.On the app it had so many racial slurs and that is disgusting to put on an app. As a fellow trump supported I will not be voting for a racist man. I am beyond not happy and want to get this app REMOVED 
IMMEDIATELY!!!
